title: Conjuncture
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KgIXGM

by yikesola

During a 2013 liveshow Phil calls Dan, only to find that Dan’s not in the apartment and has left his phone behind. He’s worried; he’s worried any time Dan does this.
A fic about Phil’s attempts to care for Dan before he sought professional help for his depression.

Words: , Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: 2013, liveshow, Depression, Hurt/Comfort, Mild Sexual Content, v mild

!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

tags: why would you put your name on hoodies and give them to other people
summary: There’s this guy at my school called Kevin Pham who’s hilarious and he made hoodies that say PHAM. across the front and sold...
body: There’s this guy at my school called Kevin Pham who’s hilarious and he made hoodies that say PHAM. across the front and sold them to people. Every time I see someone wearing one I think it says PHAN. and I’m like, yes, I must be friends with this human- wait. Then I’m disappointed.

reblog.comment: There’s this guy at my school called Kevin Pham who’s hilarious and he made hoodies that say PHAM. across the front and sold them to people. Every time I see someone wearing one I think it says PHAN. and I’m like, yes, I must be friends with this human- wait. Then I’m disappointed.

Every time I see someone wearing one I think it says PHAN. and I’m like, yes, I must be friends with this human- wait. Then I’m disappointed.

tags: the surest way to my heart
bless jen for noticing this wasn't linked
summary: Wonderful love language analysis Katie! I want to elaborate a little on the secondary shared love language of quality time and...
question: Wonderful love language analysis Katie! I want to elaborate a little on the secondary shared love language of quality time and how it relates to the timeline bc of the distance in the beginning— they constantly interacted online and Skyped for HOURS precisely bc quality time was so important yet these were their only outlets. And once they did meet in person you see them traveling to one another as often as possible until eventually they both love in Manchester—it just makes me😌😌 warm as hell!
answer:
oof yes for context (x) and i specifically stuck with recent examples for that but i think those can pretty clearly be traced back to their earlier relationship days!

the quality time, as you mentioned, spending hours on skype, talking constantly, visiting whenever they could, and moving in together? 

and phil’s been physically affectionate clawing and biting at dan since day one?

dan’s a bit harder to pin with the words of affirmation but i feel like the 2009 phan timeline (x) does a decent job of highlighting some of dan’s compliments to phil? i’m sure there were more, but his comments on the space adventure vid are a good example. i also imagine a lot of his words of affirmation were private (once they started talking) since they weren’t as in the public eye as they are now

and cheeky lil point out of phil getting dan the tonberry for christmas

anyway it’s cute they’re cute i love them and uhhh this next line is the worst mistake i’ve ever made but here ya go

my love language is dnp

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Angsty High School AUs Masterlist
body:
Links Last Checked: February 14th, 2019

Absolutely Lovely - autumnkismet

Summary: His friends and family think he’s acting strange, they’re worried that he’s depressed again, but Dan doesn’t see it. The only thing he sees is the new guy at school, the quirky one with the black hair and stunning blue eyes, and that’s bad. So bad… because he likes him, and Dan can’t like him. Dan can’t be gay. He’ll lose his family, he’ll lose his friends… he’ll become just like his father, and that’s the last thing that he wants in the entire world. It’s a scary thought that he doesn’t think will ever go away and if there’s the possibility of that happening, of him becoming the disgusting monster that his father was, or is, then maybe the world is better off without him, regardless of what PJ’s dad, his mum’s new husband, has to say.

Arms (ao3) - eqh27

Summary:
Dan draws, Phil doesn’t.
Phil wears black shirts, speaks loudly, and glares at everyone.
Dan wears grey jumpers, doesn’t talk, and tries to stay invisible.
Phil’s reckless, Dan’s not.
This is as story about two polar opposites who mange to have a string of first times together, and maybe even a cute love story.

Baby, I’m Crazy For You - cocktailaunt

Summary: Badyboy!Phil and shy!Dan broke up a few months ago and now Phil is trying to win him back.

Bus Rides (ao3) - brookwrites

Summary: Dan was straight. Then Phil started riding his bus. Dan’s not straight anymore. And somehow the entire school knows it. Can a relationship survive through classmates’ expectations, unending homophobia, infidelity, injury, and even separation? Dan could only hope.

Disasterology - howellslester

Summary: Phil moves to a new town where Dan Howell’s name is a warning and Dan likes the stars.

Falling for you - luminaryhowell

Summary: Dan Howell is dead. Well, sort of. He’s a guardian angel, forced to protect only one human, and that human is Cat. But when he accompanies Cat to school, he can’t help but be intrigued by the broken boy with the black hair who sits by the window in class and disappears at lunch times. Dan realises this boy needs more protection than Cat will ever need, so he takes on human form to save him. But soon he finds himself falling in love, which is something he definitely can’t do. Dan Howell is an angel, and he’s falling for Phil.

Heartburn (ao3) - Phandomrunners

Summary: Dan is the badass of the school. He only has one friend and everyone else is scared of him or just avoids him. Phil is pretty popular and he gets dared by one of his friends to try and get Dan to fall for him.

Who knew a dare could lead to so much more?

Here’s Hoping - adayinthelifeofphan

Summary: high school and phil just moved and dan is like mr.popular and like he hates him but secretly loves him and Phil finds something that shows that dan actually loves him and stuff like that

I Didn’t Want This From You (ao3) - Alyssa_85

Summary: Phil Lester is your above average high school student. He’s top of the class in every single lesson. Unfortunately, this makes him the perfect victim for one, Dan Howell. Dan spends every day making Phil’s life a living hell.

Dan Howell is your below average high school student. He’s not dumb by all means, he just doesn’t try. Truth is, Dan’s scared. Dan doesn’t try in fear that if he does, he’ll fail anyway.

It’s not that Dan hates Phil, it’s just he doesn’t particularly like him. Until one day, Dan’s world comes crashing around him.

Mottled Roses - auroraphilealis

Summary: Dan lives in a world where, when someone starts losing friendship, interest, or love for you, a rose magically appears on your bedside table, and you have one last chance to try and fix things before the last petal falls. His best friend Phil promised that Dan would never receive a rose from Phil, but one morning… Dan does.

Shut Your Mouth and Listen Closely (ao3) - SimplyUndead

Summary: Dan is mute with an unfortunate past. Phil is a nice boy with a warm heart and love to give.

Something No One Can Hear - six-foot-two-phanchild

Summary: Both Dan and Phil are starting over at a new school, lonely and unsociable. When Phil finds Dan, he’s not what he was expecting - he’s deaf, but that only intrigues Phil more.

The Blind Boy - jilliancares

Summary: Dan Howell liked to think of his entire life as a series of tragic accidents. Because really, how many people can say that they managed to become blind and obtain a supposedly Cute Boy’s hate all in the span of one year? And Phil Lester has not had the best school life, so in order to avoid bullying or a bad reputation, he refuses to take shit from anyone at this new school. Even if that someone just so happens to be blind.

The Light in the Dark (ao3) - PhanNotebook

Summary: Dan is a 16 year old who is bullied at school. The only bright spot in his life is being able to go home and watch videos by someone called AmazingPhil. However when a bully overhears a conversation, a bully assumes Phil is Dan’s boyfriend, and decides to make Dan’s life hell because of it. Dan tweets Phil about it, and gets a surprising reply.

The Rumor Mill - auroraphilealis, notanannoyingfangirl

Summary: Dan Howell was a nobody, invisible, until a rumor starts that he lost his virginity… to a guy. It doesn’t take long for Dan to climb the social ladder and suddenly people who didn’t even know he existed want to be his friend. But the rumors are getting out of control, and it doesn’t take long for the lies to grow to unmanageable sizes. Dan’s fall from grace is far from pretty and comes all too soon. The only person who’s not quite convinced by Dan’s school slut act is Phil Lester, the guy Dan’s liked since he was ten, and who he’s been assigned to work with on the Scarlet Letter project for their English Lit class.

Water Boy - elliesfics

Summary: (tw) Dan’s high school football season is coming to a close. The only thing worse than having his archenemy Phil Lester on the same team is the fact that he can’t even play this season. But that’s just the surface problem… the secret Dan is keeping behind closed doors is only getting harder to deal with and he worries he can’t take very much more.

Your Voice Is Pretty, Did You Know That? (ao3) - TheBetterLookingTwin

Dan howell is the new kid in the school and doesn’t think he will make any friends. However, a boy with a black fringe catches his eye but when Dan tries to talk to him the boy ignores him. Dan wonders why and tries harder.

In the end Dan befriends Phil and they try to survive through bullying and problems together. But what is Phil’s backstory and why is Dan claustrophobic?

reblog.comment:
Links Last Checked: February 14th, 2019

Absolutely Lovely - autumnkismet

Summary: His friends and family think he’s acting strange, they’re worried that he’s depressed again, but Dan doesn’t see it. The only thing he sees is the new guy at school, the quirky one with the black hair and stunning blue eyes, and that’s bad. So bad… because he likes him, and Dan can’t like him. Dan can’t be gay. He’ll lose his family, he’ll lose his friends… he’ll become just like his father, and that’s the last thing that he wants in the entire world. It’s a scary thought that he doesn’t think will ever go away and if there’s the possibility of that happening, of him becoming the disgusting monster that his father was, or is, then maybe the world is better off without him, regardless of what PJ’s dad, his mum’s new husband, has to say.

Arms (ao3) - eqh27

Summary:
Dan draws, Phil doesn’t.
Phil wears black shirts, speaks loudly, and glares at everyone.
Dan wears grey jumpers, doesn’t talk, and tries to stay invisible.
Phil’s reckless, Dan’s not.
This is as story about two polar opposites who mange to have a string of first times together, and maybe even a cute love story.

Baby, I’m Crazy For You - cocktailaunt

Summary: Badyboy!Phil and shy!Dan broke up a few months ago and now Phil is trying to win him back.

Bus Rides (ao3) - brookwrites

Summary: Dan was straight. Then Phil started riding his bus. Dan’s not straight anymore. And somehow the entire school knows it. Can a relationship survive through classmates’ expectations, unending homophobia, infidelity, injury, and even separation? Dan could only hope.

Disasterology - howellslester

Summary: Phil moves to a new town where Dan Howell’s name is a warning and Dan likes the stars.

Falling for you - luminaryhowell

Summary: Dan Howell is dead. Well, sort of. He’s a guardian angel, forced to protect only one human, and that human is Cat. But when he accompanies Cat to school, he can’t help but be intrigued by the broken boy with the black hair who sits by the window in class and disappears at lunch times. Dan realises this boy needs more protection than Cat will ever need, so he takes on human form to save him. But soon he finds himself falling in love, which is something he definitely can’t do. Dan Howell is an angel, and he’s falling for Phil.

Heartburn (ao3) - Phandomrunners

Summary: Dan is the badass of the school. He only has one friend and everyone else is scared of him or just avoids him. Phil is pretty popular and he gets dared by one of his friends to try and get Dan to fall for him.

Who knew a dare could lead to so much more?

Here’s Hoping - adayinthelifeofphan

Summary: high school and phil just moved and dan is like mr.popular and like he hates him but secretly loves him and Phil finds something that shows that dan actually loves him and stuff like that

I Didn’t Want This From You (ao3) - Alyssa_85

Summary: Phil Lester is your above average high school student. He’s top of the class in every single lesson. Unfortunately, this makes him the perfect victim for one, Dan Howell. Dan spends every day making Phil’s life a living hell.

Dan Howell is your below average high school student. He’s not dumb by all means, he just doesn’t try. Truth is, Dan’s scared. Dan doesn’t try in fear that if he does, he’ll fail anyway.

It’s not that Dan hates Phil, it’s just he doesn’t particularly like him. Until one day, Dan’s world comes crashing around him.

Mottled Roses - auroraphilealis

blog.name: knlalla
blog.title: ??¿¿?¿
blog.description:
katie || 24 || not straight || she/her || my ao3

hello lovelies thanks for joining me
tell me about your day

summary: Hi Katie! Hope you’re doing well :) I was having a little think to myself about love languages and how interesting they are as a...
question: Hi Katie! Hope you’re doing well :) I was having a little think to myself about love languages and how interesting they are as a concept, and I was wondering what you think Dan and Phil’s might be? (That is, if you know of love languages/have heard of them before!) You’re always so articulate with your thoughts/opinions and I enjoy reading them!
answer:
oooo love languages are v v interesting - for anyone who doesn’t know, love languages are the concepts of how people give and receive love (words of affirmation, quality time, acts of service, gifts, and physical affection being the five languages) and i want to preface this with the very obvious and factual statement that dnp love each other and the less obvious statement that love doesn’t have to mean romantic/sexual love

anyway, i think people talk abt dnp’s love languages quite a lot and have come to the conclusions that phil’s is probably physical touch and dan’s is words of affirmation, which i wholeheartedly support, but i do think their relationship (as any good relationship should be) is v complex and actually takes most of the love languages into account in a noticeable way (and i am gonna try to stick with the noticeable stuff and not do a lot of speculating)

one last preface - most of this is examples of how they give love bc that’s more concrete than how they receive it (it’s harder to judge reactions accurately) but most people’s love languages apply to both giving and receiving 

okay first of all, phil is absolutely a physical person, and i’m of the opinion it’s his primary love language (that we see evidence of)

and i think dan is 1. very good about receiving that type of affection from phil specifically (x) but also 2. getting better (or at least more visible) about reciprocating?

but i think phil also shows his affection with gifts too, like the expensive candle that dan literally couldn’t be happier about? it makes me wonder if gifts might be a part of phil’s love languages, like def not big gifts but meaningful ones, the ones that show he put real thought into them

i also think, as mentioned, that dan’s primary love language is words of affirmation (key moments - phil lester you’re a genius, phil’s creativity with the 7sec challenge, truth bombs, the entirety of the viewers pick my outfits vid, etc)

and i think phil’s okay at reciprocating that (although most of the time on camera he defaults to playful insults), much in the same way dan’s okay at reciprocating phil’s primary love language. but uhhhh he did do at least one pretty big thing

and i think he does make a point to ensure that any time he’s given some kind of praise, it’s shared if appropriate

but i think dan’s secondary love language, and one that they actually both share pretty well, is quality time?

bc i think he sees being able to just be around someone he cares about as like. v v important. like the comments in the what dnp text each other vid and the subsequent liveshow on how they eat together, the ditl manchester where they were waiting for each other to wake up to watch anime together, all the shows they watch together, the pizza mukbang where phil mentioned dan doesn’t like when phil’s phone is on when they’re eating, the several insta stories from phil of dan playing a game? like they just constantly express how they spend time together and i think that’s a pretty big deal in their relationship and in terms of their love languages?

like they definitely do spend time apart (which is healthy) but i think the whole ‘codependency’ joke is a real thing in the sense that they really just enjoy each others’ company and it’s clearly meaningful to them both just to be around each other whilst doing things?

anyway i think like as weird as it sounds they have their own individual love languages (primary ones being touch for phil and words of affirmation for dan) and then they have like. a shared love language? of quality time? idk it’s real sweet tho
answer_abstract:
oooo love languages are v v interesting - for anyone who doesn’t know, love languages are the concepts of how people give and receive love (words of affirmation, quality time, acts of service, gifts, and physical affection being the five languages) and i want to preface this with the very obvious and factual statement that dnp love each other and the less obvious statement that love doesn’t have to mean romantic/sexual love

anyway, i think people talk abt dnp’s love languages quite a lot and have come to the conclusions that phil’s is probably physical touch and dan’s is words of affirmation, which i wholeheartedly support, but i do think their relationship (as any good relationship should be) is v complex and actually takes most of the love languages into account in a noticeable way (and i am gonna try to stick with the noticeable stuff and not do a lot of speculating)

one last preface - most of this is examples of how they give love bc that’s more concrete than how they receive it (it’s harder to judge reactions accurately) but most people’s love languages apply to both giving and receiving 

okay first of all, phil is absolutely a physical person, and i’m of the opinion it’s his primary love language (that we see evidence of)

and i think dan is 1. very good about receiving that type of affection from phil specifically (x) but also 2. getting better (or at least more visible) about reciprocating?

but i think phil also shows his affection with gifts too, like the expensive candle that dan literally couldn’t be happier about? it makes me wonder if gifts might be a part of phil’s love languages, like def not big gifts but meaningful ones, the ones that show he put real thought into them

i also think, as mentioned, that dan’s primary love language is words of affirmation (key moments - phil lester you’re a genius, phil’s creativity with the 7sec challenge, truth bombs, the entirety of the viewers pick my outfits vid, etc)

and i think phil’s okay at reciprocating that (although most of the time on camera he defaults to playful insults), much in the same way dan’s okay at reciprocating phil’s primary love language. but uhhhh he did do at least one pretty big thing

and i think he does make a point to ensure that any time he’s given some kind of praise, it’s shared if appropriate

but i think dan’s secondary love language, and one that they actually both share pretty well, is quality time?

bc i think he sees being able to just be around someone he cares about as like. v v important. like the comments in the what dnp text each other vid and the subsequent liveshow on how they eat together, the ditl manchester where they were waiting for each other to wake up to watch anime together, all the shows they watch together, the pizza mukbang where phil mentioned dan doesn’t like when phil’s phone is on when they’re eating, the several insta stories from phil of dan playing a game? like they just constantly express how they spend time together and i think that’s a pretty big deal in their relationship and in terms of their love languages?

like they definitely do spend time apart (which is healthy) but i think the whole ‘codependency’ joke is a real thing in the sense that they really just enjoy each others’ company and it’s clearly meaningful to them both just to be around each other whilst doing things?

anyway i think like as weird as it sounds they have their own individual love languages (primary ones being touch for phil and words of affirmation for dan) and then they have like. a shared love language? of quality time? idk it’s real sweet tho

trail.content_raw:
oooo love languages are v v interesting - for anyone who doesn’t know, love languages are the concepts of how people give and receive love (words of affirmation, quality time, acts of service, gifts, and physical affection being the five languages) and i want to preface this with the very obvious and factual statement that dnp love each other and the less obvious statement that love doesn’t have to mean romantic/sexual love

anyway, i think people talk abt dnp’s love languages quite a lot and have come to the conclusions that phil’s is probably physical touch and dan’s is words of affirmation, which i wholeheartedly support, but i do think their relationship (as any good relationship should be) is v complex and actually takes most of the love languages into account in a noticeable way (and i am gonna try to stick with the noticeable stuff and not do a lot of speculating)

[[MORE]]

one last preface - most of this is examples of how they give love bc that’s more concrete than how they receive it (it’s harder to judge reactions accurately) but most people’s love languages apply to both giving and receiving 

okay first of all, phil is absolutely a physical person, and i’m of the opinion it’s his primary love language (that we see evidence of)

and i think dan is 1. very good about receiving that type of affection from phil specifically (x) but also 2. getting better (or at least more visible) about reciprocating?

but i think phil also shows his affection with gifts too, like the expensive candle that dan literally couldn’t be happier about? it makes me wonder if gifts might be a part of phil’s love languages, like def not big gifts but meaningful ones, the ones that show he put real thought into them

and i think phil’s okay at reciprocating that (although most of the time on camera he defaults to playful insults), much in the same way dan’s okay at reciprocating phil’s primary love language. but uhhhh he did do at least one pretty big thing

and i think he does make a point to ensure that any time he’s given some kind of praise, it’s shared if appropriate

but i think dan’s secondary love language, and one that they actually both share pretty well, is quality time?

bc i think he sees being able to just be around someone he cares about as like. v v important. like the comments in the what dnp text each other vid and the subsequent liveshow on how they eat together, the ditl manchester where they were waiting for each other to wake up to watch anime together, all the shows they watch together, the pizza mukbang where phil mentioned dan doesn’t like when phil’s phone is on when they’re eating, the several insta stories from phil of dan playing a game? like they just constantly express how they spend time together and i think that’s a pretty big deal in their relationship and in terms of their love languages?

like they definitely do spend time apart (which is healthy) but i think the whole ‘codependency’ joke is a real thing in the sense that they really just enjoy each others’ company and it’s clearly meaningful to them both just to be around each other whilst doing things?

anyway i think like as weird as it sounds they have their own individual love languages (primary ones being touch for phil and words of affirmation for dan) and then they have like. a shared love language? of quality time? idk it’s real sweet tho
